metadata.title: CVE-2021-46042 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A Pointer Dereference Vulnerability exists in GPAC 1.0.1 via the _fseekofunction, which causes a Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
